revision.text: {{WikiProject Automobiles|class=c |importance=high }} {{merged from|Short long arms suspension|16 September 2015}} ==Untitled== very important: two key articles are missing from the suspension part: pushrod and pullrod suspension systems, and maybe even a third more important one, electronically controlled suspension (made by bose). this would complete a quite short secttion of wikipedia. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:161.73.18.79|161.73.18.79]] ([[User talk:161.73.18.79|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/161.73.18.79|contribs]]) : The latter is somewhat covered [[Suspension_(vehicle)#Passive.2C_Semi_Active.2C_and_Active_Suspensions|here]]. --[[User:Interiot|Interiot]] 17:25, 3 April 2006 (UTC) : Added brief section on push/pull rods, though this is my first proper edit, so feel free to edit further etc. or give recommendations for the future! This new section could also use a diagram of some kind. thanks, [[User:ARDawson|ARDawson]] ([[User talk:ARDawson|talk]]) 12:36, 6 April 2011 (UTC) ::I cleaned the article up a bit, and also clarified the purpose of the pushrod and pullrod in the racing car. Feel free to add a diagram or animation if you can find one. [[User:Bdc101|Bdc101]] ([[User talk:Bdc101|talk]]) 15:52, 8 April 2011 (UTC) :::I like your edit, reads considerably better, much clearer! [[User:ARDawson|ARDawson]] ([[User talk:ARDawson|talk]]) 09:38, 11 April 2011 (UTC) == Too technical for most readers to understand? == This article has been tagged as being too technical for most readers to understand since May iof 2008, but it does not seem too techical to me. Unless someone objects, I am going to wait seven days and then remove the tag. (posted 11:10, 1 March 2011) [[User:Guymacon|Guymacon]] ([[User talk:Guymacon|talk]]) :Removed tag. [[User:Guymacon|Guy Macon]] ([[User talk:Guymacon|talk]]) 19:44, 7 March 2011 (UTC) == Merger Proposal == I, VX1NG propose that [[Short long arms suspension]] be merged with this article. Regards, [[User:VX1NG|VX1NG]] ([[User talk:VX1NG|talk]]) 15:19, 11 April 2014 (UTC) *'''Support''' - Short long arms suspension covers a specific application of the device covered here, and the information can fit in here, if it isn't here already, which is quite likely. [[User:SamBlob|Sincerely, SamBlob]] ([[User talk:SamBlob|talk]]) 19:59, 14 December 2014 (UTC) *'''Support''' - I agree with SamBlob. [[User:Arrivisto|Arrivisto]] ([[User talk:Arrivisto|talk]]) 13:07, 24 December 2014 (UTC) *'''Support''' - I would also agree. Propose doing so in 7 days if no objections raised. [[User:Eagleash|Eagleash]] ([[User talk:Eagleash|talk]]) 15:06, 9 September 2015 (UTC) {{done}} Merger performed 16 September 2015 [[User:Eagleash|Eagleash]] ([[User talk:Eagleash|talk]]) 11:39, 16 September 2015 (UTC)
